name: Function Hacker
description:
Is Algebra getting you down? Are you all of a sudden depressed because you can't figure out how to do those 'dang on' functions?

Well, we present to you..............................................................................................................................

FUNCTION HACKER

This game was made for the Hackathon located at K-State University.  Our team has made for you a game to help you with your Algebra functions. This game allows you to form your own function use snippets to get the ball from point A to point B. If the ball hits the ground, you are out. Good Luck, and Happy Learning!
